member.name: PRJ_NOTIFICATION_MAPPING
member.summary: Describes a notification mapping, which is a pairing between a directory (referred to as a "notification root") and a set of notifications, expressed as a bit mask.

member.name: PRJ_NOTIFICATION_MAPPING.NotificationBitMask
member.summary: A bit mask representing a set of notifications.

member.name: PRJ_NOTIFICATION_MAPPING.NotificationRoot
member.summary: The directory that the notification mapping is paired to.
